meanings.definition: A small cloth bearing an image of Christ's face, believed to have been miraculously imprinted on the cloth by Saint Veronica.
meanings.sent1: The vernicle was a precious cloth with a picture of Jesus.
meanings.sent2: She treasured the vernicle that showed the face of Christ.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled when they saw the vernicle with the picture of Jesus.
meanings.sent4: The vernicle, like a holy mirror, reflected the image of Christ.
meanings.sent5: The vernicle, a sacred relic, held the divine face of Jesus.

meanings.definition: To imprint or depict an image of Christ's face on a cloth.
meanings.sent1: He wanted to vernicle the image of Christ on the fabric.
meanings.sent2: She carefully vernicled the face of Jesus onto the cloth.
meanings.sent3: The artist decided to vernicle the holy face for the church.
meanings.sent4: With skilled hands, he vernicled the divine image onto the material.
meanings.sent5: To vernicle the sacred face required great precision and devotion.
